items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The knit is soft and medium-weight, offering just enough warmth for early fall.
items.body: The design is what drew me in first. The contrast pink piping along the edges adds a tailored, almost collegiate vibe that makes it easy to dress up or down. The knit is soft and medium-weight, offering just enough warmth for early fall without feeling bulky. It’s not a chunky sweater, but it layers well over a fitted tee or turtleneck. The button-down front is smooth and secure, with buttons that match the trim for a cohesive look. I ordered a medium, and while it fit across the bust and shoulders, it’s definitely a close-to-body cut. If you prefer a looser fit or plan to wear thicker layers underneath, sizing up might be a good idea. The sleeves are full-length and fitted, with a clean cuff finish that doesn’t stretch out. Color accuracy was spot-on. I chose the black with white trim, and it looked exactly like the online photo—crisp, classic, and easy to pair with jeans, trousers, or skirts. The cropped length hits just at the waistband on me (5'1"), which works well for petite frames but may feel short on taller folks. After a gentle wash, the knit held its shape and didn’t pill or fade. The stitching is neat, and the trim stayed flat without curling or fraying. This cardigan is great for layering indoors or on mild fall days, but it won’t keep you warm in colder temps without a coat. Overall, it’s a stylish, well-made piece with thoughtful details and a flattering silhouette. Just be mindful of the snug fit and cropped length when choosing your size. Perfect for adding a polished touch to your fall wardrobe rotation. Read more
items.author: SilverStar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have wardrobe essential
items.body: This cardigan is everything I was looking for, soft, stretchy, and super flattering. It’s perfect for office outfits or casual weekends. The stitching is well done, and the fabric has a nice weight to it. Great value for the price. I’m planning to order more colors! Read more
items.author: Christopher Carpenter

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and cozy
items.body: This little cardigan is soft, stretchy, and perfect for layering. The red is bright and eye-catching, and the scalloped trim adds a nice touch. I got a medium, and it fits just right; not too cropped or tight. The knit isn’t super thick, but it’s comfortable for everyday wear. For the price, it’s a great find for fall or casual outings Read more
items.author: TeeTee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Contrast trim gives this cardigan a stylish edge
items.body: The contrasting trim gives this cute, cropped sweater a nice pop. The wavy edges are a small but eye-catching detail but give the cardigan a more playful, modern look compared to a plain cropped sweater. The knit fabric feels soft and lightweight, not at all scratchy, and stretches and moves with you without losing its shape. The cropped length falls right at the waist, so it pairs best with high rise bottoms or over a dress. It can be worn buttoned up or open, and the buttons feel secure with no loose threads after a couple of weeks of wear. The cuffs are wide and stay in place without feeling tight, which makes the sleeves easy to push up if needed. This is definitely more of a style piece than a source of warmth, it is a light layer for indoors or mild weather. After two washes in a laundry bag, the fabric has kept its structure with no pilling so far. I did notice the edges can curl slightly if left to air dry unevenly, so laying it flat works best. It is a cute, cropped cardigan that adds contrast and visual interest. Well suited for someone looking for a lighter layer with a little extra personality in the details. Read more
items.author: WebShopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and cozy cardigan
items.body: This cardigan is SO soft, fits TTS, and looks really lovely in person. It is quite cropped- these pants are above my bellybutton here and as you can see, the cardigan hits almost exactly against the waistband. The sleeves are also a touch short, unlike in the model images. That said, I do feel this cardigan is worth the price! Read more
items.author: PagesandPouts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Red women’s button down cardigan with white trim - love it!
items.body: I wasn’t sure about the red but I love it! I am 5’3 and 165 and chesty. I got a medium and it works great. It’s fairly cropped but generous width. Buttons are securely sewed and the feel of the knit is soft and gentle. I admit I have not washed it yet. However it does not bleed onto my white under top. When I do wash it, if it bleeds, faded or shrinks I will update the review. I have worn it daily cos it’s so cute. I wear it over a long tight white cami-top, nineties style, with jeans. It’s very flattering. (I think so—see pics. You can see I’m a little chunky but I think it’s a cute cut, if you’re slender it’s going to look way better.) The v neck is great on my body. I like cardigans generally but they never have cute details like the contrasting, slightly ruffle trim on this one. A great buy. Read more
items.author: C.Carton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars SOFT COMFY CUTE
items.body: Very soft & cozy. The wider sleeves make layering this sweater over clothing easier. The white trim is a nice touch. The buttons are a little loose, though, with the top one probably needing to be tightened soon. It also calls for “hand washing” and “no dry cleaning” - which isn't the most convenient. Calls for a low iron if needed, but a hotter iron with steam, moving quickly along the fabric, worked best to remove wrinkles. Overall an attractive sweater that feels good on. Removed one star because of the loose buttons (see photos). Read more
items.author: Skywalker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute style and so soft!
items.body: Cute cardigan! The contrasting, white scalloped trim is what really sets this cardigan apart. Very pretty detail. The brown is a great neutral that goes with so many different colors. I've only had it a month, but I've already worn it for casual with jeans, for work with trousers, and with a dress. The knit is soft and comfortable and has held up well with repeated washings. I ordered my regular size. The fit is oversized, including sleeve length, and it comes to the top of my hips. The front has buttons all the way down, so it can be worn open or closed. The style, versatility, and quality of this cardigan make it a 5 star! Read more
items.author: JJ is JJ

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Navy, Pink, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
